Params: {3: 'As per schedule, the transport craft is ready for take-off after its temporary layover on the pad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Equipment check normal. Self-diagnostic of system normal. No errors found. Path clear. Vulture, ready for t...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Something rams into the cargo ramp. At the loud clang, the pilot turns on the monitor right away to see what's happened."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Stay here and look harder. I'll be right back.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Standing up from the co-pilot's seat, Bridget smacks the button by the cockpit's entrance in a way that makes it seem as though she's no stranger to the situation."}
{3: 'The eyes of a metallic face with no facial features now stare at Bridget, its gigantic physique making it impossible for her to see anything beyond it.'}
{3: 'Trying to pull a trick on me, huh? Haha. Funny...'}
{3: "This time, Bridget is sure she isn't seeing things."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl sitting on top of the mecha hops off and looks apologetically at Bridget as she scratches her head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'What... in the name of God is all this...', 4: '1'}
